content: our collection of official **tour de france** products is now online here you can crochet bucket hats for the whole family this unisex bucket hat is crocheted top down in continuous rounds you can crochet one either in yellow the leader s jersey green the sprinter s jersey white the youth jersey or white with red polka dots the climber s jersey **more languages ** danish 1 norwegian 2 swedish 3 french 4 dutch 5 german 6 italian 7 spanish 8 polish 9 finnish 10 **materials** 2 3 3 skeins of rainbow cotton 8/8 yellow col 54 or 2 3 3 skeins of rainbow cotton 8/8 dark green col 22 or 2 3 3 skeins of rainbow cotton 8/8 white col 01 and 1 skein of red col 58 for polka dots note if you make 2 bucket hats of the same color you will need 4 5 5 skeins of yarn one skein of red yarn will make approx 14-15 dots and you will need approx 12 dots for a hat crochet hook 4 mm us g/6 tapestry needle stitch markers **yarn quality** rainbow cotton 8/8 hobbii 100% cotton 50 g 1 75 oz = 75 m 82 yds **gauge** 15 single_crochet using crochet hook 4 mm us g/6 = 10 cm 4 **abbreviations** chain chain single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch **size** s m l **measurements** circumference 56 58 60 cm / 22 4 23 2 24 **hashtags for social media** #tdf22 #ontourwithhobbii #hobbiidesign @letourdefrance @hobbii_yarn 1 https //hobbii dk/the-tour-bucket-hat-tour-de-france
